name: customer-service-project

You can assume that the collections already exist in the database and just define the project structure. Customer API 1. Get all customers List with status ACTIVE [GET] 2. Delete customer. [DELETE] 3. Create new customer [POST] Card API 1. Get all Card List[GET] 2. Create new card [POST]
